metadata.title: CVE-2024-0450 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was found in the CPython `zipfile` module affecting versions3.12.1, 3.11.7, 3.10.13, 3.9.18, and 3.8.18 and prior. The zipfile moduleis vulnerable to “quoted-overlap” zip-bombs which exploit the zip format tocreate a zip-bomb with a high compression ratio. The fixed versions ofCPython makes the zipfile module reject zip archives which overlap entriesin the archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0450` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

idle-python3.6 - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.13+esm2
libpython3.6 - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.13+esm2
libpython3.6-minimal - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.13+esm2
libpython3.6-stdlib - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.13+esm2
libpython3.6-testsuite - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.13+esm2
python3.6 - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.13+esm2
python3.6-examples - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.13+esm2
python3.6-minimal - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.13+esm2
python3.6-venv - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.13+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

idle-python3.7 - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm3
libpython3.7 - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm3
libpython3.7-minimal - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm3
libpython3.7-stdlib - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm3
libpython3.7-testsuite - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm3
python3.7 - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm3
python3.7-examples - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm3
python3.7-minimal - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm3
python3.7-venv - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

idle-python3.8 - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm2
libpython3.8 - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm2
libpython3.8-minimal - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm2
libpython3.8-stdlib - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm2
libpython3.8-testsuite - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm2
python3.8 - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm2
python3.8-examples - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm2
python3.8-minimal - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm2
python3.8-venv - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
python3.6 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.13+esm2').
python3.7 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm3').
python3.8 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm2').
